title: Calories in a Whopper Burger
meta_description: Discover calories in whopper, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, carbs, fat, sodium, and easy tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard Burger King Whopper: flame-grilled beef patty, sesame bun, lettuce, tomatoes, pickles, onions, ketchup, mayo; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, customizations, and exact ingredients. Check Burger King app or packaging for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A standard Whopper burger contains about 657 kcal and 28 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror standard Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with fast food info.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Whopper from Burger King?
faqs.a: A standard Whopper has approximately 657 calories.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a Whopper?
faqs.a: About 28 g of protein per Whopper burger.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in a Whopper?
faqs.a: Yes, around 49 g total carbs, including 2 g fiber and 11 g sugars.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Whopper?
faqs.a: Roughly 980 mg of sodium per burger.

faqs.q: Does a Whopper have trans fats?
faqs.a: It contains about 1.5 g of trans fats due to the beef patty and bun.
